scripts.build: cross-env ROLLUP_WASM=true ROLLUP_SKIP_NODEJS_NATIVE=true svelte-kit sync && cross-env ROLLUP_WASM=true ROLLUP_SKIP_NODEJS_NATIVE=true vite build
scripts.check: cross-env ROLLUP_WASM=true ROLLUP_SKIP_NODEJS_NATIVE=true svelte-kit sync && svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json
scripts.check:watch: cross-env ROLLUP_WASM=true ROLLUP_SKIP_NODEJS_NATIVE=true svelte-kit sync && svelte-check --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --watch
